site.description: Repository containing the Eclipse plug-ins to develop asynchronous APIs using AsyncAPI. AsyncAPI provides a specification that allows you to define Message-Driven APIs in a machine-readable format. It's protocol-agnostic, so you can use it for APIs that work over Kafka, MQTT, AMQP, WebSockets, STOMP, etc. The spec is very similar to OpenAPI/Swagger so, if you're familiar with it, AsyncAPI should be easy for you.
